name: Infamous-Electro Man
description: This game tells about the boy's electric superpower,  since the city is in chaos and the thugs threat the people, the boy needs to recharge from the power cabinet to help.  But you can choose your karma to be good or bad. It's fun. The screen direction key controls the movement of boy, goes to the front of the distribution cabinet and charges by X key, the screen space key discharges the attack, and presses C key to switch three attack modes, including arc, electro-optic elasticity and electric explosion. When falling from a high place, press the upward direction key to use electric power to float, and pay attention not to step into the water, it will leak electricity.
